SHARE REPORT Email Sent Abridge # Behind the Scenes at Pittsburgh HQ 🎥 Here's some behind-the-scenes snaps from a video shoot we just completed at our HQ space in Pittsburgh, featuring our CEO and Founder, Shiv (Shivdev) Rao, and Chief Science and Chief Technology Officer Zachary Lipton. We dove deep into details of the new Contextual Reasoning Engine and the next wave of transformative Abridge capabilities. ### Want to learn more about how Abridge can help? ## Abridge The collective voice of the Abridge team.
